title: China's Renewable Energy Transition
summary_en: An in-depth analysis of China's renewable energy policies and their global impact.
summary_zh: 深度解析中国新能源政策的演进及其对全球能源格局的影响。
best_quote_en: Energy transition is not only a technological revolution, but also a social restructuring.
best_quote_zh: 能源转型不仅是一场技术革命，更是一场社会结构的重塑。

title: The Logic of Stock Cycles
summary_en: Explains the cyclical nature of stock markets and strategies for long-term investors.
summary_zh: 阐述股市的周期性特征，并提出长期投资者的应对策略。
best_quote_en: Markets are short-term voting machines but long-term weighing machines.
best_quote_zh: 市场短期是投票机，长期是称重机。

title: The Rise of Humanoid Robotics
summary_en: Covers China's development in humanoid robotics and key component innovations.
summary_zh: 报道中国在人形机器人领域的发展，以及关键零部件的技术突破。
best_quote_en: Robots are becoming the new carriers of industrial intelligence.
best_quote_zh: 机器人正在成为工业智能的新载体。

title: Mastering Business English Emails
title_zh: 掌握商务英语邮件写作
summary_en: Provides practical templates and strategies for writing professional business emails.
summary_zh: 提供实用的商务邮件写作模板与策略，帮助读者提升职业沟通能力。
best_quote_en: Every email you write builds or weakens your professional image.
best_quote_zh: 你写的每一封邮件都在塑造或削弱你的职业形象。

title: Deep Thinking in the AI Era
title_zh: 人工智能时代的深度思考
summary_en: Explores how humans can maintain deep thinking capabilities in the era of AI and fast information.
summary_zh: 探讨在人工智能和信息爆炸时代，人类如何保持深度思考能力。
best_quote_en: Thinking deeply is the last frontier that distinguishes human wisdom from machine intelligence.
best_quote_zh: 深度思考是区分人类智慧与机器智能的最后边界。

title: Cognitive Upgrades: From Neuroscience to Daily Practice
title_zh: 认知升级：从神经科学到日常实践
summary_en: Summarizes the latest neuroscience findings on improving memory, attention, and adaptability.
summary_zh: 总结最新的神经科学研究成果，聚焦如何提升记忆力、注意力和适应力。
best_quote_en: The brain is plastic; intentional training rewires it for higher performance.
best_quote_zh: 大脑具有可塑性，有意图的训练能让它重塑以实现更高效能。
